review: I have visited the doctor for various injuries since 2013. Listens to the patient, soft spoken and provides prudent advice.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Good he told me in detail about the problem and the solution... 

Since I supposed to travel the next day to some other city there he told me how to take treatment in that city hospital.. 

But I have canceled my travel and continued treatment with him .. 

I am totally satisfied..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr. Sharath Chandra is a very experienced orthopedic who recommends what is actually required in the situation.He never recommended unnecessary tests, treatments or medications like many other  orthopedics. Iam going there for past 8 years & always got the rite treatment. I also recommended him to my friends & family and everyone gave an excellent feedback.

review: I was recommended by a friend of mine and I was glad I considered. His explanations are simple *** ********* ** ********** There was no glamorization of the problem or solution. This is the very reason I don't mind traveling from malleshwaram to jayanagar to consult with him.
